doc.field: Includes a photo of HRL in cap and gown receiving an honorary degree; group shot with HRL dressed as a miner in front of the "Mine Supt. Office" sign; various portraits of HRL; HRL with Clare Booth Luce; Jo Davidson and HRL's bust; HRL with Mr. Levy of the Hecht Co.; HRL with Roy Larsen; HRL with Charles S. Rhyne and Richard Nixon; HRL with a man holding a WDSU microphone; at a reception for the Poor Richard Club Award given to Clare Boothe Luce; group shot from a Texas? event with a large number of autographs on the back; HRL at an Italian Defense Ministry event?; HRL at the opening of "Candida"; HRL with Ludwig Erhard; HRL holding a Pan Am brochure?; HRL wearing a monocle; HRL shaking hands with Jackie Robinson at an Urban League dinner; negative of a pen and ink sketch of HRL; negatives of HRL with Pope Pius XII; an original sketch of HRL signed by Paul H?; negatives of a group shot with HRL and senior Time Inc. staff; and a slide of the HRL portrait by Charles Fox.

In addition there are a large number of cutouts from contact sheets and other small photos with HRL reading, playing tennis, wearing a cowboy hat, eating, without a shirt and wearing a swimming cap, hunting, on a beach, climbing a rope, next to a microscope, and generally relaxing.
